meanings.definition: A fossil mammal of the extinct family Oreodontidae.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a well-preserved oreodont skeleton.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study oreodont fossils to learn about ancient mammals.
meanings.sent3: The oreodont in the museum seemed to wink at the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The oreodont's bones whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: Children gasped in awe at the towering oreodont skeleton.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of oreodonts.
meanings.sent1: The researcher presented findings on oreodont anatomy.
meanings.sent2: The oreodont exhibit showcased various characteristic features.
meanings.sent3: The oreodont-shaped cloud floated lazily in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had an oreodont-like charm, infectious and warm.
meanings.sent5: The oreodont pattern on the fabric was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: A member of the extinct family Oreodontidae.
meanings.sent1: The oreodont grazed peacefully in the ancient grasslands.
meanings.sent2: Hunters searched for remains of the elusive oreodont.
meanings.sent3: The oreodont family reunion was a roaring success.
meanings.sent4: She moved with the grace of an oreodont, swift and agile.
meanings.sent5: The oreodont's call echoed through the valley, haunting yet mesmerizing.
